content.detailedDescription: While visiting family on the day of the eclipse,i took random pictures of the event.After a couple of weeks i examined the pictures from my phone which has a higher resolution.After adjusting the close up effect,to my surprise,i inadvertently captured a giant ufo above the sun!!!!It was about the 10% in size in relation to the sun, and facing the sun at a 45°angle.The pic also shows faint markings,to which i have not photo shopped as of yet ,for clarity.This might be the only public photo of this ufo event!!!I have been very familiar with such subjects!!!I know what i captured on my phone!I am going to get a hard copy.
content.summary: Picture of the eclipse showing ufo above sun

content.detailedDescription: Went to a friend's house for cookout and solar eclipse viewing. later that night started taking pics of the moon it was clear night. noticed 2 objects in the sky one lit up looks as if it spun around then stopped the other never lit up they stayed there hovering the whole time. i thought why do i always catch this stuff when i take pics. i pointed it out to my  friends no one had an explanation. it was getting late and my ride was ready to go. i got a really good pic of the objects before i left. i went home and looked in the sky by was unable to find them again.
content.summary: While at a friend's for cookout and solar eclipse viewing, later that night saw 2 objects one with lights turning, spinning, hovering one motionless unlit.

content.detailedDescription: I was stargazing [in a rural community in the approximate middle of mason county] at about 8:45pm, in a northerly direction, when in the eastern sky at about 40 degrees elevation above the horizon, i noticed an object in the sky moving at a relatively fast pace, faster than any terrestrial aircraft i've seen [other than fighter jets in pursuit of something], at an elevation higher than i've seen commercial aircraft fly. this object was roughly round, glowing silvery-white but with  no functional lighting on it that a terrestrial aircraft would have, and it generated no sound. it was moving in a northerly direction, and after about a minute it changed direction 90 degrees to its left, the direction change took about 10 seconds. it stayed in this new orientation bearing northwest, for about 30 seconds, then swung back to its right, in a north direction, taking about 10 seconds to change direction. at its height, it was at an approx. 70 degree angle relative to the ground, before disappearing near the horizon behind some trees. at the same time, a regular propeller aircraft with its red lights visible, flew underneath of it at an estimated relative distance [underneath the ufo] of at least a mile, flying to the northeast. the sky was clear and relatively free of smog, on the far end of twilight. since i live in a rural area, of course there were tall trees i had to steer around to maintain my view of the sky objects. until i lost the objects behind some of the aforementioned tall trees at the horizon, i followed the sky objects with a pair of 7x binoculars, and found the objects just noticeable with the naked eye. i thought to myself that this sky object [not the airplane] didn't behave like a satellite nor did it behave like any terrestrial aircraft i'd seen up to this point. i'm guessing the whole thing took no more than 3 minutes, start to finish.
content.summary: In woods, quiet environment, silent object, dusk, thought it was iss until it veered left. no flashing, moved faster than earth-aircraft speed.

content.detailedDescription: I saw an object in the sky that had 4 lights blinking in a disc shape.  my fiance and i watched it move in random directions then moved behind a tree.  we walked down the street to get a better view but it was gone.  when we got back to the driveway we looked back to see two very large bright balls of light hoovering in the sky.  we watched them for several minutes then they started to drift apart then disappeared.
content.summary: Two large bright balls of light stationary in the sky then drifted

content.detailedDescription:
Going from back door to garage door to put recycles out, arms were full, doors are both in same corner. noticed orange-red light coming towards the house, first thought it was a plane. took a double take as have not seen that before - it was low, larger than a plane light & color was different. 
ran in grabbed my cell, ran out took a pic then a video. my arms were still full so had trouble finding the object then difficulty holding cell still.
object could not be a chinese lantern because the wind was whipping around as can be heard in vid.
orange light turned, about 50/55° began ascending, seemed to fade out but likely just went above low clouds above the electric station.
i felt a bit surprised to see any such thing in this part of prov as it is highly populated and many airports therefore radar.
content.summary: Orange-red light floating/flying from the north, turned east slightly south, above power plant seemed to ascend a bit, went out of view maybe above low clouds

content.detailedDescription:
i was outside looking south. there was a very bright white light, flashing about twice per second - no other colors - moving west to east below the cloud cover. it was larger and was going much faster than other aircraft. fast enough that each flash looked to be a dash. imagine sirius on a clear night, flashing and rapidly moving. 

this object made a sudden 90 degree turn south. in about two seconds it made a similar turn to the east, then south again, then back east for 3 to 4 seconds then vanished. possibly moving into and above the cloud layer. the cloud was not illuminated. 

i have seen others flying similar zig zag paths at high speed, but, never with this much cover or this size.

being a quiet rural area, jets and other aircraft are easily heard. this one was silent.
content.summary: Larger, brighter, faster than other aircraft

content.detailedDescription: Watched a star like object that was flashing red, green, and white in a random pattern drop out of the sky before making a 90 degree turn and appearing to come closer. checked radar app (flightradar24) and closest return was a helicopter in the area of post falls, id. no returns in the area. attempted to get video but would not show up on video. object was still in sky at time of report.
content.summary: Red/white/green object flashing in sky before making 90 degree turn and remaining in place

content.detailedDescription: I had just arrived home, i approached my front door when my dad says he saw something in the sky just then. he came back out and described the event and the object. we both sat out in the dark. the skies were clear and other aircraft were in the airspace, including helicopters. with our eyes glued to the sky, we witness a quick small object with a short following trail pass at a high altitude north of us. i lost track of it almost immediately. we both exclaim, alerting my mother and grandfather. they join us and ten minutes later, a closer and brighter passing of the craft (or possibly another) occurs. it was a bright white circle in the sky with a bright white trail. hard to tell the altitude or size of the object. i start to help unload the work truck and while i was storing things in the garage, my mother sees it again. no more sightings occurred after that. my father has been seeing these objects flying and zipping by over here some nights. hope others that see this same event report it.
content.summary: Bright ball of light, possible flight pattern or more than one object in clear night sky

content.detailedDescription: I have been getting abducted and messed with i think i wake up an i feel like i've been beatin up . sometimes i can't walk . sometimes i wake up and something has been suckin or has sucked on my nipple or both . my dogs can sence the entities also they get fat but there not eating and then there back to normal . they stair at the wall but nothing is there they act like they have been beatin . they chase invisible things all the way out the back door and into the back yard . i've noticed scare on them . . i sometimes hear electric zap noise . i can see shadows moving in my peripheral vision lots . and the dogs react to these movements too . i also can smell an off garlic/earthy / sulpher smell when there around or have been around . it's almost like me and the dogs are bein implanted with something then it gets removed from us i'm having horrible dreams now . i've tried to video tape my self or my bed room but the videos are getting erased in some parts some how . i'm always tired but can barely sleep . i've seen greenish eyes in the back yard but when i get back there they are gone
content.summary: I feel like i'm getting transported or teleported

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was at my house getting ready for work and noticed these 3 objects in the sky moving, then would stay still, then move again. at first i thought they were helicopters, but then i thought that helicopters can move like these. i lost sight of them after they disappeared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Far away, but lights could be seen in daylight

content.detailedDescription:
Flying objects south of humacao down-town of puerto rico.

i went through a drive around the highway and started taking pictures to the mountains. found some objects around the same area from a different angle i reported on previous cases. this time i was closer to the "hot area" when taking the pictures. 

_dsc0972.Jpg saturday‎, ‎september‎ ‎9‎, ‎2017 ‎8‎:‎12‎ ‎am

there are two version of pictures. one version is the original the camera took. the other version which has 'cleared' appended in the filename has its curves and levels cleared-up.
content.summary: Flying objects south of humacao down-town of puerto rico.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my boyfriend sitting at the end of a dead end street with a small forested area around us. the sky was clear and we live in toronto so it's not unusual to have objects flying in the sky (ie. airplanes, helicopters, drones..) he noticed the lights in the sky first. these lights were flashing, moving sporadically (hovering, moving up and down, right and left) and changing colours (they would be flashing red, blue and white light, then change to one solid white, and then back to the three coloured lights again). it appeared that it was either just inside or just outside our atmosphere (but i'm unsure excatly). we watched the lights for approximately an hour and a half trying to figure out what it was. we realized he had the sky view app and we could use this to see if it was a satellite. it appeared to be a green orb moving on the screen. it was to the left of the "crab" constellation. i'm unsure which direction we were facing. we tried clicking the green orb (you can do that with stars and satellites to get info) but it wouldn't work. we spent approximately 10 minutes attempting to click on the orb. i was sitting in the passenger seat and that's when i heard twigs snapping just inside the forest to my right. i looked over and just inside i could see 2 blue eyes (they looked like oval shaped lights) about 6-7ft tall. i began to panic and asked my boyfriend if he saw it. and then i looked at him frantically, and looked back and screamed "do you see that!?!" as i pointed at it. that's when i saw the outline of the right side of it's face like the moon just giving a light outline. that was enough. that was terrifying. so we drove away quickly and we ended up parking beside a fence about 5 - 10 minutes later. we were only there for a couple moments when i looked beside me and slowing phasing into view was this grey black eyed thing. we drove again. we drove around until the sun came up. i didn't want to stop. it was honestly one of the scariest things i've ever experienced. i just don't know how else to explain it. we spent hours trying to give explainations.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Blinking lights with 2 beings appearing

content.detailedDescription:
Flying objects south of humacao down-town of puerto rico.

i went through a drive around the highway and started taking pictures to the mountains. found some objects around the same area from a different angle i reported on previous cases. this time i was closer to the "hot area" when taking the pictures.

content.summary: Flying objects south of humacao puerto rico

content.detailedDescription:
I was ten years old, and every weekend i would visit my grandparents who lived just a couple of miles away. i can remember the atmosphere exactly. the sky was clear, the stars were brighter than usual, as was the moon. there was hardly a breeze, although it was coming up to ten past 11, which is sometimes unusual in the uk. my grandparents generously let us stay up way past normal bedtime hours. we'd listen to music, talk about current events and other things, but nothing out of the ordinary, so when this experience happened,  i guess i wasn't taken seriously and ever since then, i've kept it quiet 
i was in the garden, and my grandparents had just gone inside to make hot chocolates and turn off the music. i always look at the sky and the stars, and i saw something i couldn't explain. i've done so much to see if anyone else has seen them or had a similar experience;

there were 8 birds the size of big doves flying across the sky, they were completely pure gold, and somehow almost glowing. they were flying gracefully, in perfect formation across the clear sky. i couldn't believe what i was seeing, because i tried to rationalise it somehow.  i couldn't understand how they were glowing so bright as there was no source of light for them to reflect. i just watched them fly past in total amazement and wonder. 

to this day i still haven't found any explanation or similar occurrence.
content.summary: Standing in my garden, clear night, golden glowing birds flying in formation

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home down 7 mile rd in pamplico, south carolina around 9:30 pm,when i observed two lights in the sky that appeared out of place. it was clear out, and several stars were visible but, these two seemed different. while watching them they moved and swapped position with one another. their movement was arced and rather quick, faster than a jet or airplane would have appeared at that elevation. suddenly, one them ascended, or possibly shrunk, until it was completely out of sight. the other remained in position for about another ten seconds and then simply disappeared from sight suddenly. these objects were comparable in size, and brightness, to the night's stars, but we're visibly lower in the sky. they appeared to be some distance apart but, were able to switch position in the sky with each other very quickly. i observed them for around 10 seconds before they changed position, watched them hover for around two minutes, then they were gone. at some points by view was blocked by trees. however, for most of the time they were in my view.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw 2 lights in sky, watched them hover, swap position and then disappear

content.detailedDescription: At the time of the event i was passing the rear door of my home and heard an airplane approaching.  this is typical due to being in the flight path of lambert st. louis airport.  i notice what i thought to be the space station coming up over the tree line.  we often spot the space station and satellites from our back yard.  however this particular light was larger and more brilliant than that of the space station.  when the orb topped the tree line from my vantage point it stopped and hovered.  holding its position for several moments as i tried to get my youngest child’s attention from within the home, the orb did not move.  when my child finally joined me they too observed the orb hovering and holding its position.  we were unable to gauge the distance against any landmarks.  there were no flashing lights or sound and did not resemble a drone as we own a dji phantom 3 professional.  we observed the light for approximately 8 minutes in total.  the light traveled what i believe to be east and stopped to hover for several moments and then changed directions heading south and eventually lost site behind a tree.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observation of a single brilliant light in the western sky lasting approximately 8 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was delivering food to a house in south philadelphia. as i walked back to my truck i looked up and saw something orange in the sky. it looked so strange, never saw anything like it. after looking at it for about  30 seconds it sort of morphed into an orb and moved southwest to northeast.. it seemed slow at first but them moved at a steady pace in a straight line across the sky. they did not appear to be manmade lights, they resembled more a flame or flare. i ran to my truck to grab my phone so i could record it. i got some footage of the first one and just as it moved out of sight, a second one appeared also in the sw portion of the sky and headed ne also. i got pretty good footage especially of the second. still not sure what i saw, but i know what i didn't see. and it wasn't anything that is normally seen in the sky, including chinease lanterns. i posted videos on facebook and found that others have seen this object in my area. no one knows what it was. but they all described the same thing.. i was glad to know i wasn't the only one who saw it. i'd like to know what this was! i can not stop looking at the sky.. when i got back to the resteraunt i saw helicopters looking around about 20 mins after event. i added both videos of orb and a video of helicopter.,, the video is a bit shakey and not the clearest but it's the best i could do in an instant.
content.summary: Walking back to my truck and looked up and saw an orb that just didn't belong in the sky. there were two that came from southwest and one after the other moved across the sky. they followed the same trajectory.. i recorded footage on my phone and left

content.detailedDescription:
Was watching the moon through our telescope on sept 4th 2017, approx 10 pm, the moon was huge, so almost my entire lens was filled with the light of the (close to?) full moon. i saw something fly across what my visual was through the telescope, and the moon i was focussing on behind. i actually exclaimed to my husband something that looked like a huge bird that wasn't a bird flew across the moon. didn't think much of it until we had that meteorite or satellite debris or whatever fall across our be sky. then someone in a group i am in on facebook shared a photo of something she saw fly across the moon sept 8th, and it looked like the thing i saw, but her photo was blurred than what i saw. someone told her to look up the black knight satellite, which out of curiosity i did, and it looks like what i saw. i even posted about it on my fb four days before this other lady saw it too. she lives somewhere else though. lol,i probably sound crazy, but whatever.

thanks for your time.
content.summary: I was watching the huge moon in my telescope, and something definitely flew across my sight line.

content.detailedDescription:
Recently i have captured several ufo items in my camera.. 3 different types now...Only within the last two month...Most photos were captured before the big solar eclipse.. i have had a mufon investigator out here before when a ufo appeared over my house (approximately 2 years ago)...
in his report, he deemed me to be a reliable person with nothing to gain from reporting that ufo sighting...
content.summary: Hello, i have caught several ufo in my camera in the last 2 months..Long black rods, metal orbs

content.detailedDescription: We stepped outside the front door to smoke, were looking at the big dipper, when i turned and noticed strange lights to the nw. watched for a few moments and realized it was not a plane. my adult son was with me and i pointed it out to him. we stood and watched it and he asked if i had any binoculars, which i did not. then he said i'll get my phone. has zoom feature). we watched for about 5 minutes and it did'nt move location. i told him i was going to the end of the street to get a clearer veiw. once there i could see it much clearer and told him to come down where i was. he began taking photos, and we stood there for another 20 mins, during this time i noticed a neighbor was up with his door open and called him out to see it. we watched it for some time and all agreed it was not something normal. i am disabled and could no longer stand there so we headed back to the house and watched for a few more mins. it is now 10:20 pm and is still there and in the same position.( but now slightly higher) this thing is very large. approx. 5 miles away would be our guess, and pinky nail size at arms lenght in size. not a planet that i am aware of. i am a skywatcher , and have never in any season noticed this before. as i write this it is still observable.And appears to be bobbing up and down in elevation. though very slowly. signing off and now 10:30 , still there. have photo's but don't know how to download them.
content.summary: Watched lights for about 45 mins, and quit observing.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was at a friends house a few homes down, visiting. we both saw the incident.
2. very bright green light crossing the southern horizon at a fast speed.
3. meteor or ufo.
4. the green, perfectly round circle flew from the west to an ese direction before disappearing behind a treeline. we found it odd because it was still light out from the sun just going down. it made no noise, and stayed the exact same intensity of light and color, with no debris behind it. at first we thought it was a meteor, but it didnt really have the same characteristics because it was too large, no trail of debris, and it remainex the same brightness. we both thought it might have left a vapor trail, but it was very faint. afterwards, we looked south and saw 2 to 4 twinkeling lights... very small. the first stars were just becoming visible, but these appeared and reappeared for several minutes after the green orb passed. then they disappeared, and were no longer there. we noted it because they should have gotten brighter with the other stars coming out as it got darker.
6. it appeared from behind the roof of the house, travelled across the sky from about 45 degrees above the ground when first seen, to about 20 degrees as it disappeared to the se.

it may very well have just been a meteor, but we report it in case others thought they saw it and appeared more ufo like.
content.summary: Large fast moving green ball of light crossing sky, and twinkeling points of light to the south

content.detailedDescription: I went out for a smoke about 10 30 pm on sept 10th 2017 and i observed some strange lights in the north eastern sky. i am still trying to figure out what i saw but i know when i grabbed my binoculars and looked at it i saw one of the most unsettling things i have ever saw . i really hope someone else saw this as well and confirms it for my own peace of mind
content.summary: I observed a bunch of strange lights in a group in the north eastern sky tonight . i have never seen anything like it in my life . i grabbed my binoculars and got a good look at these lights and they appeared to be in the formation of an egg or a face .

content.detailedDescription: We were driving down ansburogh ave. toward  university ave. when i saw bright white lights low altitude. it was floating/ flying to the right for a second. then stopped for a second and started going to the left. as it went almost overhead i could see it was triangle shaped. tip was pointed left and the back side may have been wider than the sides. also i saw 3 white lights on the back side/ bottom one at tip/bottom there was a red light in the middle. as it headed left over houses we tried to follow on the roads it seemed to speed up because after maybe 10 mins i could only see blinking white lights.
content.summary: The object was floating to the right stopped then stopped and then went left

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the clouds because i noticed a yellow colored disk. there turned out to be a white one also. they were huge and stationary.  i have photos.I was excited about seeing them like all the other odd things i've seen.
content.summary: Two ufos in the clouds and one in the field across from me.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the recent solar eclipse and decided to take a few photos with my cell phone camera as i looked at the first photo i noticed the camera was picking up something along with the eclipse. so i just clicked off five or six photos with camera steadied by resting on the roof of my van. the photos were pretty interesting even on my 5.7 inch phone screen but when i uploaded to computer a couple had better detail later i saw where google photos put them in animation as the app automatically  does with like photos that i noticed that the object was moving. i am including photos in there original form but i played with enlarging and different filtering that brought out more detail.The object is light in color next to what i believe is camera lens flare im not sure what any of it is just keeping an open mind to everything.
content.summary: Could not see with naked eye caught while taking photos of 2017 eclipse with phone camera.Camera was steadied by resting camera on roof of van

content.detailedDescription:

ciel pile devant moi. elle est apparue comme ã§a, soudainement. j'ai de suite ã©liminã© la possibilitã© que ce soit un avion, un hã©licoptã¨re, montgolfiã¨re ou autre. elle ã©tait ã©norme et ã©tait en vol stationnaire. comme la rn83 est en pente descendante ã  cet endroit, la sphã¨re ã©tait tout droit ã  l'horizon devant moi, donc nul besoin de lever la tãªte, et nettement plus grosse que lorsque je vois la lune ou le soleil dans le ciel. j'ã©tais au mãªme moment au tã©lã©phone et en ai fait part ã  mon interlocuteur, en direct le ciel ã©tait bleu azur absolument sans aucun nuage. j'ai cerceau assez ã©pais (les contours ã©pais de la sphã¨re) et au moment pile ou j'ai clickã© pour actionner le mode vidã©o, la sphã¨re a disparu instantanã©ment, d'un coup, ne laissant place qu'ã  un immense ciel bleu azur, comme avant son apparition. puis, quelques secondes plus tard, j'ai vu, mais beaucoup plus loin et haut dans le ciel, un nuage tout blanc et parfaitement circulaire, qui photo de l'endroit oã¹ je me trouvais si vous le souhaitez, peut ãªtre arriverez-vous ã  en dã©duire sa taille approximative (ã©norme). j'ai voulu faire un tã©moignage sur ovnis-france mais sur mon sentiment est que ma volontã© d'immortaliser cette apparition a ã©tã© "dã©tectã©e" d'oã¹ l'impossibilitã© de le faire, puis la disparition totale de l'observation, au moment pile. oã¹ j'appuyais sur le on de vidã©o pour la lancer... je suis bien entendu joignable pour tous renseignements complã©mentaires. 

cordialement, sandra -  alsace dpt 68.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving on tangerine road.  saw the lights, and puller over to see and film
watched for about 10 min and filmer
content.summary: 3 balls of light with glimmer of red and blue hovering, flying near tangerine rd and copper spring dr

content.detailedDescription:
28/07/2017 ã  20h02 je conduisais en voiture sur 1 double  voie rn 83 sens mulhouse->belfort, lorsque soudain je vis une immense sphã¨re argentã©e/chromã©e trã¨s polie (brillante) dans le ciel pile devant moi. comme la rn83 est en pente descendante ã  cet endroit la sphã¨re ã©tait tt droit ã  l'horizon donc nul besoin de lever la tãªte. j'ã©tais au mm moment au tã©lã©phone et en au fait part ã  mon interlocuteur. le ciel ã©tait bleu azur absolument sans aucun nuage. j'ai dã©verouillã© mon iphone qui s'ã©tait mis en veille, ai voulu prendre 1 photo, mais il a obstinã©ment refusã© de la prendre alors que ma capacitã© de stockage est encore grande. je me suis obstinã©e et lã  le bouton photo avait disparu de mon ã©cran (?!). ensuite, j'ai voulu prendre 1 vidã©o en vitesse car la sphã¨re se dã©matã©rialisait depuis mon essai photo, comme 1 hologramme qui en partant de son centre disparaissait et ã  la place je voyais le ciel bleu azur. ne restait plus que comme 1 cerveau assez ã©pais et au moment pile ou j'ai clickã© pour prendre 1 vidã©o, la sphã¨re ã  disparu instantanã©ment, ne laissant place qu'ã  un immense ciel bleu azur. puis qlq secondes plus tard, j'ai vu, mais bcp plus loin/haut un nuage tout blanc et parfaitement circulaire. je peux aisã©ment prendre 1 photo de l'endroit oã¹ je me trouvais si vous le souhaitez, peut ãªtre arriverez vous ã  en dã©duire sa taille approximative (ã©norme). j'ai voulu faire 1 tã©moignage sur ovnis-france mais sur tã©lã©phone ã§a ne le validait pas. j'ai cependant retrouvã© sur leur site 1 personne qui avait observã© 1 sphã¨re qlq jours auparavant, dans un autre dã©partement. mon sentiment est que ma volontã© d'immortaliser cette apparition a ã©tã© "dã©tectã©e" d'oã¹ l'impossibilitã© de le faire puis la disparition au moment oã¹ j'appuyais sur le on de vidã©o... je suis bien entendu joignable pour tous renseignements complã©mentaires.

certaines rã©ponses du formulaire ne correspondent pas ã  mon observation, ou je n'ai pu bien rã©pondre ne comprenant pas forcement certains termes anglais, mais pour valider, il m'a fallu cocher certaines cases.
content.summary: Grosse sphã¨re chromã©e brillante

content.detailedDescription: Me my fiance my brother and 2 kids were at the park near my house i looked up to,see a white ball not blinking like a plane at all so i,watched it as i'm telling my fiance and brother to look up at this a second orb appears it flys in front of the first one disappears and than the second one kept moving dimmed and was gone .
content.summary: Orbs saw by 2 other ppl besides me

content.detailedDescription:
The 27/08/17 at night, around 22:00 my wife call me to look outside saying that she was seeing a strange light over the hills near our house. i was on bed watching tv, we were almost ready to go to sleep.
i stood at the side door and we both watch an object that had a cylinder shape with big lightened windows with a random of colors from the white through the orange-red.

on top of that hill there´s nothing, close to there there is a site that works like a quarry where they extract construction material. also there is a little village at hills´s skirts.

we first thought somebody was up there doing some work, but it was not.

the most amazing thing this shape did, was that it made very big explosions of energy lighting a top portion of the hill where it was posed.

it was like if it were a giant welding machine finished with an arch of light at the end.

the event was already started when we first noticed, it lasted hours; the cylinder ended it´s performance with just a red rounded light blinking from time to time.

we stayed watching the event for about 4 straight hrs. finally we got tired and went to sleep.

very early in the morning about 7:00 hrs, i peep out at the hill and of course there was absolutely nothing there.
content.summary: We saw a very large, big cylinder shape with lightened windows; doing big explosions of light seemed like a very big welding machine.
